summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%) and rainfall (up 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 631 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1582 m), light levels (up 3619 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 4.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 631.4m lower than yesterday, 543.7m lower than the past week, 1581.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1092.8m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, very clammy and humid and little or no wind. Rain showers likely, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
